rows.label: qst202604_msg0001
rows.name:
Your Majesty, Queen Lagert,
the subjugation is complete.
You can rest assured now.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0002
rows.name: Everyone, I am truly grateful.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0003
rows.name:
Still, I wonder where such
a monster came from.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0004
rows.name:
Considering the incident
in Luxuria, it is certainly
a cause for concern...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0005
rows.name:
An invasive species of monster
could greatly disrupt the
ecosystem of the native species.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0006
rows.name:
The source of the Laias
has been identified.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0007
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst202604_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes, while you were on your way
to the subjugation, a messenger
arrived from Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0009
rows.name:
It was reported that there has been an
abnormal outbreak of Laias at a place
called Xataris Spring in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0010
rows.name: Temperantia...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0011
rows.name:
So the Laias born there flew
long distances and reached
the various Divine Beasts.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0012
rows.name:
It's possible that similar damage to
what happened in Invidia will occur
in various places from now on...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0021
rows.name:
Yes...[ML:Dash ] We should head to Temperantia
and eliminate the Laias.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0022
rows.name:
It's going to be a tough
fight against such a
formidable opponent, though.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0023
rows.name: But this is something only we can do.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0024
rows.name: You're right. Shall we go?

rows.label: qst202604_msg0025
rows.name: Ten'i...[ML:Dash ] we're counting on you again.

rows.label: qst202604_msg0026
rows.name: Leave it to me...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0027
rows.name:
Everyone, for the sake of
Alst, I ask for your help.
And please, be careful...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0013
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ][ML:Dash ]!

rows.label: qst202604_msg0014
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]What is this...? This
strange feeling...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0016
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Could it be...? My power...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202604_msg0017
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]Hey, Ten'i! We're going!

rows.label: qst202604_msg0018
rows.name: Ah, yes...[ML:Dash ]
